name: Shido (Kieryu, Jen Prox)
description:
》 Description

Plants and nature help us to connect with ourselves and take a break from this quickly changing and technological world. 

Taking care of a garden, plants, flowers and trees helps us to relax, relieve stress and lift our mood.

Not everybody has the opportunity to experience it, this game tries to replicate it in an accessible way to everybody, you just need a phone.

*Works in Win/Mac, Android and iOS, but the best experience is in Android

》 Instructions
  • Drag the seed to the pot.
  • Keep your bonsai watered and fertilizer. 
  • To a better view, pinch and drag to zoom and move the camera.
  • Select scissors to cut leaves and branch (tap & hold). 
  • Select water drop to spawn a cloud (tap & move to start watering).
  • Select love icon to spawn fertilizer (tap & move to drop them).
  • Enjoy! ♡
  • And if you like your creation, share it!
